events.name: Spook-kiki Costume Party
events.description: Join Kaelea Kae & friends for a Spook-kiki, hangout and Halloween costume party. Get dressed up and share your spooky stories & memories of past Halloweens.

events.name: Halloween in Salem
events.description: Join Salem Witch Wiles, our favorite Salem witch and historian to learn about the history of Halloween.

events.name: Shiva Honey
events.description: Join Shiva Honey, priestess, Minister of Satan and Death Doula, for a Satanic Halloween evening and DJ sesh.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: The Rabbit's Fall Harvest
events.description: Come peek to see who found some snacks in the kitchen! Hint: They Will Be Rabbits

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
